title.rendered: Christmas Hours + FREE $10 Gift Card Promo!

content.rendered:
Merry Christmas from all of us at Gottwals Books!

Christmas Hours

Perry

Monday, Tuesday, Friday, Saturday: 10:00 A.M. – 5:00 P.M.

Wednesday: 10:00 A.M. – 4:00 P.M.

Thursday (Christmas): Closed

 

Macon, Warner Robins, Byron

Monday, Tuesday, Friday, Saturday: 9:30 A.M. – 6:00 P.M.

Wednesday (Christmas Eve): 9:30 A.M. – 4:00 P.M.

Thursday (Christmas): Closed

 

Only 6 Days Left!

Remember, you only have 6 days left to earn a free $10 Gottwals gift card with every $25 gift card purchased! Offer valid now until Christmas Eve. Gift cards are valid at all Gottwals locations (Byron, Perry, Macon, Warner Robins) and must be redeemed after Christmas Day.

 

Toy of the Week

Giraffe Giant Stuffed Animal: $99.97

Over four feet tall, this gentle giant brings a touch of the exotic into any environment. The perfect accessory in a nursery, this eye-catching giraffe is a great addition to any décor! Attention to authentic details and excellent quality construction make this giraffe easy to love!

excerpt.rendered: We wish you a very Merry Christmas! View the article to see our Christmas hours and a few other fun items.
